resources.string: HTC One M8 mini’s Sense 6 to Lack Important Multimedia Features

Soon after the ofﬁcial unveiling of the HTC One M8 smartphone, Taiwanese mobile phone maker HTC Corporation was rumored to plan the release of a smaller flavor of the device, and some more info it is now available. Supposedly called HTC One M8 mini, the phone is said to arrive on shelves with the Sense 6.0 UI loaded on top.
